name: Farewell Demo
description:
What would you do if you were so overwhelmed by a situation that you lose yourself?

Farewell is a game about people who are dragged into a fantasy world when a situation overwhelms them. They will have to fight against their own fears in order to get out of there.

https://www.farewellgame.com/
